item.title: Over 7,400 Illegal Immigrants Arrested in US Over Last 9 Days
item.description: Over 7,400 illegal immigrants have been arrested in the U.S. over the last nine days under President Donald Trump, reports Fox News.

item.title: Acting FBI Director Strongly Resisted Trump Admin Firings
item.description: Brian Driscoll, the acting FBI Director, strongly refused a Department of Justice order to aid in the firing of agents involved in Jan. 6 protest case...

item.title: CDC Removes Gender, DEI References from Public Health Sites

item.title: Blaine Holt to Newsmax: Congress Must Not Politicize Crash
item.description: The investigation into the deadly collision between a U.S. Army Black Hawk helicopter and an American Airlines passenger jet must not become politiciz...

item.title: Musk: US Treasury Approved Payments to Terrorists
item.description: On Saturday, Elon Musk, chair of the Department of Government Efficiency, said the U.S. Treasury approved payments to terrorists.
